wikipedia_page.main: Joe Murray (born 1963) is a former British Army soldier and television personality from Glasgow, United Kingdom. He is best known for his role on ITV programme, Bad Lads' Army.

response: * Joe Murray (rugby league) (1887–1944), Australian rugby league player
* Joe Murray (animator) (born 1961), American creator of Rocko's Modern Life and Camp Lazlo
* Joe Murray (British Army soldier) (born 1963), British soldier and television personality
